attrs.name: @@{vm_hostname}@@@@{calm_array_index}@@
attrs.resources: @{nic_list=System.Object[]; parent_reference=; guest_tools=; num_vcpus_per_socket=1; num_sockets=2; serial_port_list=System.Object[]; gpu_list=System.Object[]; memory_size_mib=4096; power_state=ON; hardware_clock_timezone=; guest_customization=; type=; account_uuid=28b0cf0a-59e5-4d3e-bef1-80bca0b8e4ff; boot_config=; disk_list=System.Object[]}

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: @@{vm_hostname}@@
fqdn: @@{vm_hostname}@@.@@{dns_domain}@@
write_files: 
- content: |
    search @@{dns_domain}@@
    nameserver @@{DNS_SERVER1}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf
users:
  - name: "centos"
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh-authorized-keys:
    - @@{ansible_public_key}@@
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    @@{centos.username}@@:@@{centos.secret}@@
  expire: False
write_files:
  - content: |
      DEVICE=eth0
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=no
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{ip_address}@@
      NETMASK=@@{netmask}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{gateway}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
runcmd:
  - [ifdown, eth0]
  - [ifup, eth0]

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: @@{vm_hostname}@@
fqdn: @@{vm_hostname}@@.@@{dns_domain}@@
write_files: 
- content: |
    search @@{dns_domain}@@
    nameserver @@{DNS_SERVER1}@@
  path: /etc/resolv.conf
users:
  - name: "centos"
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh-authorized-keys:
    - @@{ansible_public_key}@@
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    @@{centos.username}@@:@@{centos.secret}@@
  expire: False
write_files:
  - content: |
      DEVICE=eth0
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=no
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{ip_address}@@
      NETMASK=@@{netmask}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{gateway}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
runcmd:
  - [ifdown, eth0]
  - [ifup, eth0]
